maqras.text: 26|1|ttwa ssin mim
26|2|geugeos-eun seongseoui bunmyeonghan malsseum eulo
26|3|amado geudaeneun geudeul-i midji anihameulo geudae ma-eum-i seulpeojilila
26|4|hananim-i wonhaessdamyeon geubun-eun geudeul-ege haneullobuteo yejeung-eul naelyeo geudeullo hayeogeum sunjongke hayeoss-euli la
26|5|geuleona hananim-eulobuteo saeloun malsseum-i geudeul-ege ileul ttaemada geudeul-eun deung-eul dollieossdeola
26|6|geudeul-eun geu mesejileul bujeonghayeoss-euni geudeul-i jolonghaessdeon sasil-eul al ge doelila
26|7|geudeul-eun daejileul balaboji anihaneunyo hananim-i geu an-e eolmana manh-eun yeoleo jonglyuui joh-eun geos-eul saengseongke haneunyo
26|8|sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i issgeo neul geuleona geudeul daedasuneun midji a nihadeola
26|9|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
26|10|geudaeui junim-i moseleul bulleo joejieun baegseong-egelo gala hasyeoss-eu ni
26|11|geudeul-eun hananim-eul dulyeowohajianhneun palaoui baegseongdeul-ieossdeola
26|12|geuga malhagil juyeo sillo jeo neun geudeul-i jeoleul geoyeoghaji anihal kka dulyeomnaida
26|13|jeoui gaseum-i dabdabhago je hyeoga gud-eo mal-i naoji anhseubnida alon-eul bonaeeo juobsoseo
26|14|geudeul-i jeoegelo joeleul dollyeo naleul salhaehalkka dulyeobnaida lago hani
26|15|ie hananimkkeseo dul-ege i leusigil gyeolko geuleohji ani hageoneul uliui yejeung-eul gajigo gala naega neohuiwa hamkke hayeo neohuiui buleum-e unghalila
26|16|geuligo ne dul-iseo palao-e ge gaseo malhala sillo ulineun man-yu ui junim-i bonaen seonjijala
26|17|jeohuiwa hamkke iseula-el baegseong eul bonaeeo jusoseo lago hani
26|18|ittae palaoga moseege mal hagil uliga neoleul jasig-eulo yang-yug hayeossgo neoneun uli gaundeseo olaen sewoldong-an geojuhayeoss-eumyeonseodo
26|19|nega haenghan neoui haeng-wilo boaneoneun eunhyeleul baebanhan ja jung hanala go malhani
26|20|mosega ileugil naega geugeos-eul jeojilleoss-eul ttaeneun naega banghwanghaneun ja deul gaunde iss-eossseubnida
26|21|geulihayeo naneun dangsindeul-i du lyeowo dojuhayeossneunde naui junimkke seo na-ege jihyeleul jusyeossgo naleul seon jijadeul jung-ui han seonjijalo seontaegha syeossseubnida
26|22|iseula-el baegseong-eul noyelo chwi geubhago iss-eumyeonseo geugeos-i naege be puneun eunhyeibnikka lago hani
26|23|ie palaoga man-yuui junim ilan mueos-inyo lago mul-eumae
26|24|haneulgwa daejiwa geu saie iss neun modeun geos-eun junim-isibnida sillo dangsinkkeseo hwagsin-eul gajgoja habnikka lago mosega daedabhani
26|25|neohuineun geuga malhan geos-eul deudjianihayeossneunyo lago malhamyeo
26|26|mosega malhagil taechobuteo dang sindeul-ui junim-ieossgo dangsin seonjodeul-uijunim-isyeossseubnida
26|27|palaoga sillo neohuiege bo naeeojin neohuiui seonjijaneun michinjalago malhaja
26|28|mosega malhagil dangsindeul-i jeong sin-i issneun salamdeul-ilamyeon sillo geu bun-eun dongjjoggwa seojjog geu saie issneunmodeun geos-ui junim-isibnida
26|29|gwalaoga malhagil man-il nega na oeui sin-eul seomgindamyeon sillo naeganeoleul tuoghalila
26|30|naega dangsinkke myeongbaeghan yejung-eul boyejunda haedo geuleohseubnikka
26|31|man-il nega jeongjighan jalamyeon geuyejeung-eul boyeodallago hadeola
26|32|geulihayeo geuga jipang-ileul deon jini bola geugeos-i bunmyeonghan baem-eulo byeonhaessdeola
26|33|geuga geuui son-eul naemini bolageugeos-eun bogo issneun salamdeul ap-eseo hayansaeg-i doeeossdeola
26|34|ittae palaoga geuui juwie issneun udumeoliege malhagil sillo i janeun suglyeondoen masulsala
26|35|geuga geuui masullosseo neohuileulneohuiui ttang-eseo chubanghalyeo hani ji geum naega eojjihamyeon doegessneunyo malha ni
26|36|geudeul-i daedabhagil geuwa geuligo geuui hyeongjeege beol-eul jamsi bolyuhago yeoleo dosilo modeun masulsadeul eul jibhabhadolog jeonlyeong-gwan-eul pagyeonhayeo
26|37|neungsughan modeun masulsadeul-eul de lyeo odolog hasoseo
26|38|geulihayeo jeonghayeojin eoneunal je sigag-e masulsadeul-i jibhabdoeni
26|39|gunjung-ege dadeul moyeossneunyo la go solichini
26|40|man-il geudeul-i seunglihandamyeon u lineun i masulsadeul-eul ttaleuge doebni kka
26|41|masulsadeul-i dochaghayeo palao ege malhagil uliga man-il seunglihan damyeon ulineun jeogjeolhan bosang-eul bad-eul su issseubnikka lago hani
26|42|mullon-ila geuleohgeman doendamyeon neohuineun nae gakkai iss-eul geos-ilago haja
26|43|mosega geudeul-ege malhagil neo huiga deonjilyeohaneun geos-eul deonjyeobola
26|44|geudeul-i basjulgwa jipang-ileul deon jimyeo malhagil palaoui gwonselo u liga seunglihalila
26|45|geuttae mosedo geuui jipang-ileul deonjyeossdeola bola geuttae geudeul-i deonjin geos-eul samkyeo beolyeossdeola
26|46|geuttae masulsadeul moduga ttang-e buboghamyeo
26|47|malhagil jeohuineun sillo man-yuui junim-eul midgo
26|48|mose-ui junim-isimyeo alon-ui junim-eul midnaida lago haja

26|49|palaoga malhagil naega neohui ege heolaghagi jeon-e geuleul midneundan mal-inyo bunmyeong geuneun neohuiege masul eul galeuchyeo jun udumeoliigeoneul neo huineun god alge doelila naneun neohuiuisongwa bal-eul seolo daleuge jeoldanhayeo neohui moduleul sibjaga-e dal-a noh-eu lila
26|50|ittae geudeul-i malhagil amuleon pihaega eobsnaida jeohuineun bunmyeong ju nimkkelo dol-aganaida
26|51|jinsillo jeohuineun junimkkeseo jeo huiui joeleul sahayeo jusieo jeohuiga choecholo midneun jadeul-i doegileul bala naida
